00023 void Histogram2D::init(const Glib::ustring &title)
00024 {
00025     Curve::init(title);
00026     zMax_=-DBL_MAX;
00027     zMin_=DBL_MAX;
00028     scaleZrange_=true;
00029     draw_options_ = HISTOGRAM2D_BOX;
00030 }
00031 
00033 void Histogram2D::copy(const Histogram2D &c)
00034 {
00035     Curve::copy(c);
00036 
00037     hist_ = c.hist_;
00038     draw_options_ = c.draw_options_;
00039     xBinning_ = c.xBinning_;
00040     yBinning_ = c.yBinning_;
00041     zMin_ = c.zMin_;
00042     zMax_ = c.zMax_;
00043     scaleZrange_ = c.scaleZrange_;
00044 }

00048 {
00049 }

00055 Histogram2D::Histogram2D(const Glib::ustring &title)
00056     : Curve(title),
00057       zMin_(0),
00058       zMax_(0),
00059       scaleZrange_(true)
00060 {
00061 }

00064 Histogram2D::Histogram2D(const Histogram2D &c)
00065     : Curve(c)
00066 {
00067 }

00070 const Histogram2D& Histogram2D::operator=(const Histogram2D &c)
00071 {
00072     if (this != &c)
00073     {
00074         copy(c);
00075         curve_changed();
00076     }
00077 
00078     return *this;
00079 }

00094 void Histogram2D::set_data(const Binning &x_binning, const Binning &y_binning,
00095                                    double *flat_bin_array)
00096 {
00097     xBinning_=x_binning;
00098     yBinning_=y_binning;
00099 
00100     if (!xBinning_.is_valid() || !yBinning_.is_valid()) {
00101         hist_.clear();
00102         return;
00103     }
00104 
00105     unsigned int n_bins_total=(yBinning_.n_bins()+2)*(xBinning_.n_bins()+2);
00106     // is larger than zero by construction
00107     //  if (n_bins_total<=0) return;
00108 
00109     hist_.resize(n_bins_total);
00110     
00111     //    for (UInt_t bin_i=0; bin_i<n_bins_total; bin_i++) {
00112     //  x_[bin_i]=flat_bin_array[bin_i];
00113     //    }
00114     double *src_iter=flat_bin_array;
00115     double a_min=DBL_MAX;
00116     double a_max=-DBL_MAX;
00117     for(std::vector<double>::iterator dest_iter=hist_.begin(); dest_iter!=hist_.end(); dest_iter++, src_iter++) {
00118         *dest_iter=*src_iter;
00119         if (*dest_iter>a_max) a_max=*dest_iter;
00120         if (*dest_iter<a_min) a_min=*dest_iter;
00121     }
00122     if (scaleZrange_ || zMin()>=zMax()) {
00123         zMin_=a_min;
00124         zMax_=a_max;
00125         scaleZrange_=true;
00126     }
00127     curve_changed();
00128 }

00130 void Histogram2D::set_data(const Binning &x_binning, const Binning &y_binning,
00131                            float *flat_bin_array)
00132 {
00133 
00134     xBinning_=x_binning;
00135     yBinning_=y_binning;
00136 
00137     if (!xBinning_.is_valid() || !yBinning_.is_valid()) {
00138         hist_.clear();
00139         return;
00140     }
00141 
00142     unsigned int n_bins_total=(yBinning_.n_bins()+2)*(xBinning_.n_bins()+2);
00143     // is larger than zero by construction
00144     //  if (n_bins_total<=0) return;
00145 
00146     hist_.resize(n_bins_total);
00147     
00148     //    for (UInt_t bin_i=0; bin_i<n_bins_total; bin_i++) {
00149     //  x_[bin_i]=flat_bin_array[bin_i];
00150     //    }
00151     float *src_iter=flat_bin_array;
00152     double a_min=DBL_MAX;
00153     double a_max=-DBL_MAX;
00154     for(std::vector<double>::iterator dest_iter=hist_.begin(); dest_iter!=hist_.end(); dest_iter++, src_iter++) {
00155         *dest_iter=*src_iter;
00156         if (*dest_iter>a_max) a_max=*dest_iter;
00157         if (*dest_iter<a_min) a_min=*dest_iter;
00158     }
00159     if (scaleZrange_ || zMin()>=zMax()) {
00160         zMin_=a_min;
00161         zMax_=a_max;
00162         scaleZrange_=true;
00163     }
00164     curve_changed();
00165 }

00175 DoubleRect Histogram2D::bounding_rect() const
00176 {
00177     if ( xBinning_.x_min() >=  xBinning_.x_max() || yBinning_.x_min() >=  yBinning_.x_max()) 
00178         return DoubleRect(1.0, -1.0, 1.0, -1.0); // invalid
00179 
00180     return DoubleRect(xBinning_.x_min(), xBinning_.x_max(), yBinning_.x_min(), yBinning_.x_max() );
00181 }
00182 
00197 void Histogram2D::draw(const Glib::RefPtr<Gdk::Drawable> &painter,
00198     const DoubleIntMap &xMap, const DoubleIntMap &yMap, int from, int to)
00199 {
00200     if (!xBinning_.is_valid() || !yBinning_.is_valid()) return;
00201 
00202     if ( data_size() <= 0 )
00203         return;
00204 
00205     if (to < 0)
00206         to = data_size() - 1;
00207 
00208     if ( verify_range(from, to) > 0 ) {
00209         //draw_curve_(painter, cStyle_, xMap, yMap, from, to);
00210         draw_box_(painter, 0, xMap, yMap);
00211         
00212     }
00213 }
00214 
00227 void Histogram2D::draw_box_(const Glib::RefPtr<Gdk::Drawable> &painter, 
00228                             int style,
00229                             const DoubleIntMap &xMap, 
00230                             const DoubleIntMap &yMap)
00231 {
00232     unsigned x0_i=xBinning_.find(xMap.d1());
00233     unsigned x1_i=xBinning_.find(xMap.d2());
00234     if (x0_i <= 0) x0_i = 1;
00235     if (x1_i > xBinning_.n_bins()) x1_i = xBinning_.n_bins();
00236 
00237     unsigned y0_i=yBinning_.find(yMap.d1());
00238     unsigned y1_i=yBinning_.find(yMap.d2());
00239 
00240     if (y0_i <= 0) y0_i=1;
00241     if (y1_i > yBinning_.n_bins() ) y1_i = yBinning_.n_bins();
00242 
00243     unsigned int bins_per_y_slice = xBinning_.n_bins()+2;
00244 
00245     unsigned int bin_x0_i = y0_i*bins_per_y_slice + x0_i;
00246 
00247     double width_x=xBinning_.bin_width();
00248     double width_y=yBinning_.bin_width();
00249    
00250     std::vector<Gdk::Point> polyline;
00251 
00252     double y = yBinning_.x_min() + (y0_i-1) * width_y;
00253 
00254     if ( (xMap.i2()-xMap.i1())  <= 0 ||  ( yMap.i1()-yMap.i2() ) <= 0) return;
00255 
00256     unsigned int combine_bins_x=1;
00257     if (  static_cast<unsigned int>(xMap.i2()-xMap.i1()) < 10 * (x1_i - x0_i) ) {
00258         combine_bins_x= (10 * (x1_i - x0_i)) / (xMap.i2()-xMap.i1());
00259         if (   static_cast<unsigned int>(xMap.i2()-xMap.i1())  < 10 * (x1_i - x0_i) / combine_bins_x) {
00260             combine_bins_x++;
00261         }
00262     }
00263 
00264     unsigned int combine_bins_y=1;
00265     if (   static_cast<unsigned int>( yMap.i1()-yMap.i2() ) < 10 * (y1_i - y0_i) ) {
00266         combine_bins_y=  (10 * (y1_i - y0_i)) / ( yMap.i1()-yMap.i2() );
00267         if (   static_cast<unsigned int>( yMap.i1()-yMap.i2() ) < 10 * (y1_i - y0_i) / combine_bins_y) {
00268             combine_bins_y++;
00269         }
00270     }
00271 //    std::cout << " comb: x =" << combine_bins_x << "  y " << combine_bins_y << std::endl;
00272     
00273     if (combine_bins_y>1 || combine_bins_x>1) {
00274 //      if (combine_bins_x<1) combine_bins_x=1;
00275 //      if (combine_bins_y<1) combine_bins_y=1;
00276         double x_start=xBinning_.x_min() + (x0_i-1) * width_x ;
00277 
00278 //      std::cout << " width_x = " << width_x << " -> " ;
00279         width_x*=combine_bins_x;
00280 //      std::cout << width_x << std::endl;
00281 
00282 //      std::cout << " width_y = " << width_y << " -> " ;
00283         width_y*=combine_bins_y;
00284 //      std::cout << width_y << std::endl;
00285 
00286         for (unsigned y_i=y0_i; y_i<=y1_i; y_i+=combine_bins_y) {
00287             
00288             unsigned bin_i=bin_x0_i;
00289             double x = x_start;
00290             
00291             for (unsigned x_i=x0_i; x_i<=x1_i; x_i+=combine_bins_x) {
00292                     
00293 //          assert ( bin_i < hisst_.size() );
00294                     int a_x0 = xMap.transform(x);
00295                     int a_x1 = xMap.transform(x+width_x);
00296                     if (a_x0> a_x1) {
00297                         int temp=a_x1;
00298                         a_x1=a_x0;
00299                         a_x0=temp;
00300                     }
00301                     
00302                     int a_y0 = yMap.transform(y);
00303                     int a_y1 = yMap.transform(y+width_y);
00304                     if (a_y0> a_y1) {
00305                         int temp=a_y1;
00306                         a_y1=a_y0;
00307                         a_y0=temp;
00308                     }
00309                     
00310                     double bin_content=0;
00311                     unsigned int bin_xstart_ii=bin_i;
00312                     unsigned int last_bin_x=( x_i+combine_bins_x > xBinning_.n_bins()+1 ? xBinning_.n_bins()+1 : x_i+combine_bins_x) ;
00313                     unsigned int last_bin_y=( y_i+combine_bins_y > yBinning_.n_bins()+1 ? yBinning_.n_bins()+1 : y_i+combine_bins_y) ;
00314                     for (unsigned y_ii=y_i; y_ii<last_bin_y; y_ii++) {
00315                         unsigned int bin_ii=bin_xstart_ii;
00316                         for (unsigned x_ii=x_i; x_ii<last_bin_x; x_ii++) {
00317                             bin_content+=hist_[bin_ii] - zMin() ;
00318                             bin_ii++;
00319                         }
00320                         bin_xstart_ii += bins_per_y_slice;
00321                     }
00322                     
00323                 if (bin_content > 0 )  {
00324                     double scale = 0.5 * (bin_content ) / (( zMax() - zMin() ) * (combine_bins_y * combine_bins_x));
00325                     if (scale>.49) scale=.49;
00326                     if (scale<0) scale=0.;
00327 //          assert ( scale *.99 < .5 );
00328                     int b_y0= static_cast<int>( 0.5 * (a_y0 + a_y1) - (a_y1-a_y0) * scale);
00329                     int b_y1= static_cast<int>( 0.5 * (a_y0 + a_y1) + (a_y1-a_y0) * scale);
00330                     
00331                     int b_x0= static_cast<int>( 0.5 * (a_x0 + a_x1) - (a_x1-a_x0) * scale);
00332                     int b_x1= static_cast<int>( 0.5 * (a_x0 + a_x1) + (a_x1-a_x0) * scale);
00333 
00334 //                  std::cout <<  x << "," << y << " = " << bin_content  << " -> " << scale 
00335 //                            << " x : "  << a_x0 << " , " << a_x1 
00336 //                            << " -> " << b_x0 << "," << b_x1  << " -> " << (b_x1-b_x0 > 0 ? b_x1-b_x0 : 1 )
00337 //                            << " y : " << a_y0 << ", "<< a_y1 << " -> " << b_y0 << "," << b_y1  << " -> " << (b_y1-b_y0 > 0 ? b_y1-b_y0 : 1)
00338 //                            << std::endl;
00339                     
00340                     painter->draw_rectangle(paint()->pen(painter), false, b_x0, b_y0, (b_x1-b_x0 > 0 ? b_x1-b_x0 : 1 ), (b_y1-b_y0 > 0 ? b_y1-b_y0 : 1));
00341                 }
00342                 x+= width_x;
00343                 
00344                 bin_i+=combine_bins_x;
00345             }
00346             y += width_y;
00347             bin_x0_i += bins_per_y_slice*combine_bins_y;
00348         }
00349     }
00350     else {
00351     for (unsigned y_i=y0_i; y_i<=y1_i; y_i++) {
00352 
00353         unsigned bin_i=bin_x0_i;
00354         double x = xBinning_.x_min() + (x0_i-1) * width_x ;
00355 
00356         for (unsigned x_i=x0_i; x_i<=x1_i; x_i++) {
00357             if (hist_[bin_i] > zMin())  {
00358 
00359 //          assert ( bin_i < hisst_.size() );
00360             int a_x0 = xMap.transform(x);
00361             int a_x1 = xMap.transform(x+width_x);
00362             if (a_x0> a_x1) {
00363                 int temp=a_x1;
00364                 a_x1=a_x0;
00365                 a_x0=temp;
00366             }
00367 
00368             int a_y0 = yMap.transform(y);
00369             int a_y1 = yMap.transform(y+width_y);
00370             if (a_y0> a_y1) {
00371                 int temp=a_y1;
00372                 a_y1=a_y0;
00373                 a_y0=temp;
00374             }
00375 
00376             double scale = 0.5 * (hist_[bin_i]-zMin()) / ( zMax() - zMin());
00377 //          assert ( scale *.99 < .5 );
00378 //          int b_y0= 0.5 * (a_y0 + a_y1) - static_cast<int>((a_y1-a_y0) * scale);
00379 //          int b_y1= 0.5 * (a_y0 + a_y1) + static_cast<int>((a_y1-a_y0) * scale);
00380 
00381 //          int b_x0= 0.5 * (a_x0 + a_x1) - static_cast<int>((a_x1-a_x0) * scale);
00382 //          int b_x1= 0.5 * (a_x0 + a_x1) + static_cast<int>((a_x1-a_x0) * scale);
00383             int b_y0= static_cast<int>( 0.5 * (a_y0 + a_y1) - (a_y1-a_y0) * scale);
00384             int b_y1= static_cast<int>( 0.5 * (a_y0 + a_y1) + (a_y1-a_y0) * scale);
00385             
00386             int b_x0= static_cast<int>( 0.5 * (a_x0 + a_x1) - (a_x1-a_x0) * scale);
00387             int b_x1= static_cast<int>( 0.5 * (a_x0 + a_x1) + (a_x1-a_x0) * scale);
00388             
00389             painter->draw_rectangle(paint()->pen(painter), false, b_x0, b_y0, (b_x1-b_x0), (b_y1-b_y0));
00390             }
00391             x+= width_x;
00392 
00393             bin_i++;
00394         }
00395         y += width_y;
00396         bin_x0_i += bins_per_y_slice;
00397     }
00398     }
00399 
00400 }
